Sql.CDATA:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM MPSetupApproval ) BEGIN
INSERT INTO [dbo].[MPSetupApproval] ([CompanyID] ,[AssignmentMapID] ,[CreatedByID] ,[CreatedByScreenID] ,[CreatedDateTime] ,[LastModifiedByID] ,[LastModifiedByScreenID] ,[LastModifiedDateTime] ,[isActive]) SELECT 2, assignmentmapid, createdbyid, 'EP205000', getdate(), createdbyid, 'EP205000', getdate(), 1 from EPAssignmentMap where [name] = 'Punch Employee Activity' END GO
